text: Leslie James Ames (29 August 1912 – 26 November 1998) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Les Ames's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1912 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Northcote Football Club players
title: Les Ames (footballer)
